alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:05PM EDT until August 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in south central Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 505 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Climax, or near Battle Creek, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albion... Marshall... Battle Creek... Homer... Union City... Burlington... Level Park-Oak Park... Brownlee Park... Marengo... Athens... Tekonsha... Pine Creek... Bedford... Ceresco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
